testingRequirements: Tests must validate user-facing behavior, not implementation details
Focus on what users actually do - integration tests over unit tests
Don't mock excessively - test real behavior where possible
Coverage metrics are meaningless - user flow coverage is everything

userStories.title: Redesign button component with luxury styling
userStories.description: Create Button component with primary, secondary, tertiary variants. Use design tokens. Implement hover, active, disabled states.

userStories.title: Redesign card component
userStories.description: Create Card component for recipe display. Include image area, content area, optional actions. Use 12px border radius and subtle shadow.

userStories.title: Redesign navigation component
userStories.description: Update Navigation component with elegant desktop top nav and refined mobile bottom nav. Clear active states.

userStories.title: Create luxury input and form components
userStories.description: Create FormInput component with labels, focus states, error states. Ensure accessibility.

userStories.title: Redesign tabs component
userStories.description: Create Tabs component with underline-style design. Implement keyboard navigation and ARIA support.

verificationSteps: Run `pnpm type-check` - must pass with no errors
Run `pnpm lint` - must pass with no errors
Run `pnpm test` - all tests must pass

epicDescription: Redesign core UI components to match luxury aesthetic
